description: Association Semailles is recognized as one of the pioneering cocagne gardens. The association focuses on social integration through economic activity, providing support to around 70 individuals in professional transition each year. Association Semailles engages in market gardening, selling produce through a small grocery shop and offering solidarity baskets to subscribers, promoting sustainable food practices. Nous sommes fiers de contribuer activement depuis 1997, à la relocalisation nécessaire de notre alimentation. Nous produisons chaque année, plus de 70 tonnes de fruits et légumes BIO que nous distribuons, en circuit court, au plus grand nombre.
name: Association Semailles
